productName: HL-L2440DW Duplex WIFI Laser Printer Brother HL-L2440DW Mono Laser Dual Band WIFI Duplex Printer For Home & Small Office
description:
A4 print speed up to 30 ppm (Black)
USB 2.0, WiFi (Dual Band), WiFi Direct, AirPrint, Mopria, Mobile Connect
Auto 2-sided (Duplex) printing, Intuitive Buttons, 1 Line LCD Display, 64 MB Memory, 250 Sheets Paper Tray
Full capacity toner included. Yield up to 3000 pages (black)*
Compatible Brother Apps - BRAdmin Light, BRAdmin Pro4 : Windows App (By Download)
1 Year on-site warranty included
